Room.Name: Trantori's Locked Door
Room.ShortDescription: You are hovering in the air, just outside a locked door beneath the summer home of Trantori, the High Invoker.
Room.LongDescription: You are inside the biggest redwood tree in the Enchanted Forest. A hollow shaft inside the trunk of the tree seems to serve as a bad-weather entry for the High Invoker. The door seems to be locked with a silver filigree lock. This might be a store room of some sort.
